constituent: flower pot, puzzle, horns, two hands, tile, one, ceiling, cane, stick, drop, fishhook, ice
koohiiStory1: A flower pot that has been dropped on the floor is like a puzzle of ceramic tiles to glue together.
koohiiStory2: To solve this puzzle all you need is to put the flower pot on top of the proper tile. (cue secrets tune from Zelda).
